name: @arcademan/next-proxy
description: Next Proxy is a universal, secure API proxy for Next.js projects. It centralizes, audits, and controls all external API calls from a single entry point, providing features like CORS, logging, request/response transformation, access control, and rate limiting—ideal for projects requiring governance and security over outbound traffic.

scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build

author: Haroldy Arturo Pérez Rodríguez <haroldyarturo@gmail.com>
